versions.title: Type of Address
versions.definition: Identifies the type of address entered as contact information for an individual or an organization.
versions.notes: This vocabulary was first published by the DDI Alliance. Please see: https://ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies/all.
versions.citation: DDI Alliance. (2020). Type of Address (Version 1.0) [Controlled vocabulary]. CESSDA. urn:ddi:int.ddi.cv:TypeOfAddress:1.0.
versions.ddiUsage:
DDI 3.2
Module name: archive
Element name: TypeOfAddress

DDI 2.5 
DDI-Codebook (DDI 2.5 and all previous DDI versions) does not include an element or attribute that would support this controlled vocabulary.

concepts.title: Mailing address
concepts.definition: Includes both "street", and P.O. Box addresses used for sending and receiving physical/conventional mail through the postal system.

concepts.title: Mailing address: Residential
concepts.definition: Address for directing physical/conventional mail to a person's private residence; this entry will not be used to describe addresses of businesses, organizations, or other type of associations.

concepts.title: Mailing address: Nonresidential
concepts.definition: Address for directing physical/conventional mail to a business, organization, or other type of association.

concepts.title: Visiting address
concepts.definition: Address used to identify a physical location (typically a building or a unit in a building) that may be accessed in person.

concepts.title: Visiting address: Residential
concepts.definition: Visiting address for a person's private residence; this entry will not be used to describe addresses of businesses, organizations, or other type of associations.

concepts.title: Visiting address: Nonresidential
concepts.definition: Visiting address for a business, organization, or other type of association.

concepts.title: Other
concepts.definition: Use if type of address is known, but not found in the list.
